column4: hello i got a problem in capture audio. in real it works but the sound reprodution is fast and cuting my voice.. the same in amsn and skype.. i tried the test in system preferences sound.. and there i tried all options i have for capture, and i got a message error... Failed to construct test pipeline for 'gconfaudiosrc ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! gconfaudiosink profile=chat'
did you get the restricted extras pkge for skype?
maybe no, but my sound is strange in amsn too.. im running gutsy
anyway how can i get this extras pkge ?
something is crashing the capture =\
Demonho-br  "something is a big word for me. I am sure if you are patient that some one in here will be able to help you in a far better way than I
of course.. thank you =)
Demonho-br  however if you want to get those pkges Ill post how for you
if possible, i would like to get the pkg.. please

do wget http://www.medibuntu.org/sources.list.d/gutsy.list -O /etc/apt/sources.list.d/medibuntu.list && wget -q http://packages.medibuntu.org/medibuntu-key.gpg -O- | sudo apt-key add - && sudo apt-get update  then sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras w32codecs libdvdread3 libdvdcss2
thank u !
i made my question few minutes ago, do you think someone will read it yet ?
yes
okay ! =)

I donty know
